title: ContrastADR
descriptionMarkdown: The ContrastADR data connector provides the capability to ingest Contrast ADR attack events into Microsoft Sentinel using the ContrastADR Webhook. ContrastADR data connector can enrich the incoming webhook data with ContrastADR API enrichment calls.

dataTypes.name: ContrastADR_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ContrastADR_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ContrastADR_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

instructionSteps.title: Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template
instructionSteps.description:
Use this method to automate deployment of the ContrastADR Data Connector using ARM Template.

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://aka.ms/sentinel-ContrastADR-azuredeploy)
2. Provide the following parameters: Region, Function Name, CONTRAST_HOSTNAME, CONTRAST_API_KEY, CONTRAST_SERVICE_KEY, CONTRAST_USER_NAME, ENRICHMENT_DATA_SUBSCRIPTION, EXCLUDED_FIELDS, RETRY_INTERVAL, RETRY_TIMES, SHARED_KEY, TIMEOUT, WORKSPACE_ID, and App Insights Workspace Resource ID.
